nodes.text: Sama Zo was a male Voss commando living during the Cold War and Galactic War. He used the Bounty Brokers Association to put a bounty on a local Exchange leader Eryn Talosa - an off-worlder solution for an off-worlder problem.
Sama Zo first appeared in game update 2.3 of the MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2013.
He is only accessible through the Bounty Contract Week event quest series of the players in the game on Voss.
